text: José Gonçalves Heleno (3 November 1927 - 1 September 2021) was a Brazilian Roman Catholic prelate. He was the Coadjutor Bishop of Governador Valadares from 1976 until 1977. He was also the Bishop pf Governador Valadares from 1977 until 2001. He was born in Cipotânea, Brazil. Gonçalves Heleno died on 1 September 2021 in Caratinga, Brazil from stroke-related problems at the age of 93.Morre Dom José Heleno, bispo emérito de Governador Valadares ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Minas Gerais Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops
title: José Gonçalves Heleno
